00010 
00011 CellRect::CellRect( Material& material_in,
00012             double alpha_in,
00013             int nGPoints_in,
00014             double x1_in, double y1_in,
00015             double x2_in, double y2_in,
00016             double x3_in, double y3_in,
00017             double x4_in, double y4_in,
00018             double dcx_in,double dcy_in,
00019             double minX_in,double minY_in,
00020             double maxX_in,double maxY_in
00021           )
00022   : Cell( material_in
00023         , alpha_in
00024         , nGPoints_in
00025         )
00026     , Az(0)
00027     , minX(minX_in)
00028     , minY(minY_in)
00029     , minZ(0)
00030     , maxX(maxX_in)
00031     , maxY(maxY_in)
00032     , maxZ(0)
00033 {
00034   points.resize(4,2);
00035   points.writeElement(x1_in,0,0); points(0,1) = y1_in;
00036   points(1,0) = x2_in; points(1,1) = y2_in;
00037   points(2,0) = x3_in; points(2,1) = y3_in;
00038   points(3,0) = x4_in; points(3,1) = y4_in;
00039 
00040   Ax = x2_in - x1_in;
00041   Ay = y3_in - y2_in;
00042 
00043   this->jacobian = Ax/2. * Ay/2.;
00044 
00045   this->createGaussPoints( dcx_in, dcy_in );
00046 
00047 }
00048 
00049 CellRect::CellRect( Material& material_in,
00050             double alpha_in,
00051             int nGPoints_in,
00052             double x1_in, double y1_in, double z1_in,
00053             double x2_in, double y2_in, double z2_in,
00054             double x3_in, double y3_in, double z3_in,
00055             double x4_in, double y4_in, double z4_in,
00056             double x5_in, double y5_in, double z5_in,
00057             double x6_in, double y6_in, double z6_in,
00058             double x7_in, double y7_in, double z7_in,
00059             double x8_in, double y8_in, double z8_in,
00060             double dcx_in,double dcy_in,double dcz_in,
00061             double minX_in,double minY_in,double minZ_in,
00062             double maxX_in,double maxY_in,double maxZ_in
00063           )
00064   : Cell( material_in
00065         , alpha_in
00066         , nGPoints_in
00067         )
00068     , minX(minX_in)
00069     , minY(minY_in)
00070     , minZ(minZ_in)
00071     , maxX(maxX_in)
00072     , maxY(maxY_in)
00073     , maxZ(maxZ_in)
00074 {
00075   points.resize(8,3);
00076   points.writeElement(x1_in,0,0); points(0,1) = y1_in; points(0,2) = z1_in;
00077   points(1,0) = x2_in; points(1,1) = y2_in; points(1,2) = z2_in;
00078   points(2,0) = x3_in; points(2,1) = y3_in; points(2,2) = z3_in;
00079   points(3,0) = x4_in; points(3,1) = y4_in; points(3,2) = z4_in;
00080   points.writeElement(x5_in,4,0); points(4,1) = y5_in; points(4,2) = z5_in;
00081   points(5,0) = x6_in; points(5,1) = y6_in; points(5,2) = z6_in;
00082   points(6,0) = x7_in; points(6,1) = y7_in; points(6,2) = z7_in;
00083   points(7,0) = x8_in; points(7,1) = y8_in; points(7,2) = z8_in;
00084 
00085   // only valid for rectangular blocks
00086   Ax = x2_in - x1_in;
00087   Ay = y3_in - y2_in;
00088   Az = z5_in - z1_in;
00089 
00090   this->jacobian = Ax/2. * Ay/2. * Az/2.;
00091 
00092   this->createGaussPoints( dcx_in, dcy_in, dcz_in );
00093 }

00096 {
00097 }

00100 void CellRect::createGaussPoints( double dcx_in, double dcy_in, double dcz_in )
00101 {
00102   lmx::DenseMatrix<double> gCoef( (size_type)nGPoints,2); // col 1: offset from center point,  col 2: weight factor.
00103 
00104   if (nGPoints == 1){
00105     gCoef(0,0) = 0.; gCoef(0,1) = 1.;
00106  }
00107   else if(nGPoints == 2){
00108     gCoef(0,0) = -std::sqrt(1./3.); gCoef(0,1) = 1.;
00109     gCoef(1,0) =  std::sqrt(1./3.); gCoef(1,1) = 1.;
00110   }
00111   else if(nGPoints == 3){
00112     gCoef(0,0) = -0.77459666924148337703; gCoef(0,1) = 0.88888888888888888888;
00113     gCoef(1,0) =  0.00000000000000000000; gCoef(1,1) = 0.55555555555555555555;
00114     gCoef(2,0) =  0.77459666924148337703; gCoef(2,1) = 0.88888888888888888888;
00115   }
00116   else if(nGPoints == 4){
00117     gCoef(0,0) = -0.86113631159405257522; gCoef(0,1) = 0.34785484513745385737;
00118     gCoef(1,0) = -0.33998104358485626480; gCoef(1,1) = 0.65214515486254614262;
00119     gCoef(2,0) =  0.33998104358485626480; gCoef(2,1) = 0.65214515486254614262;
00120     gCoef(3,0) =  0.86113631159405257522; gCoef(3,1) = 0.34785484513745385737;
00121   }
00122   else if(nGPoints == 5){
00123     gCoef(0,0) = -0.90617984593866399279; gCoef(0,1) = 0.23692688505618908751;
00124     gCoef(1,0) = -0.53846931010568309103; gCoef(1,1) = 0.47862867049936646804;
00125     gCoef(2,0) =  0.00000000000000000000; gCoef(2,1) = 0.56888888888888888889;
00126     gCoef(3,0) =  0.53846931010568309103; gCoef(2,1) = 0.47862867049936646804;
00127     gCoef(4,0) =  0.90617984593866399279; gCoef(3,1) = 0.23692688505618908751;
00128   }
00129   else if(nGPoints == 6){
00130     gCoef(0,0) = -0.932469514203152; gCoef(0,1) = 0.23692688505618908751;
00131     gCoef(1,0) = -0.661209386466265; gCoef(1,1) = 0.47862867049936646804;
00132     gCoef(2,0) = -0.238619186083197; gCoef(2,1) = 0.56888888888888888889;
00133     gCoef(3,0) = -gCoef(2,0)       ; gCoef(3,1) = gCoef(2,1);
00134     gCoef(4,0) = -gCoef(1,0)       ; gCoef(4,1) = gCoef(1,1);
00135     gCoef(5,0) = -gCoef(0,0)       ; gCoef(5,1) = gCoef(0,1);
00136   }
00137   else if(nGPoints == 8){
00138     gCoef(0,0) = -0.96028985649753623168; gCoef(0,1) = 0.10122853629037625915;
00139     gCoef(1,0) = -0.79666647741362673959; gCoef(1,1) = 0.22238103445337447054;
00140     gCoef(2,0) = -0.52553240991632898581; gCoef(2,1) = 0.31370664587788728733;
00141     gCoef(3,0) = -0.18343464249564980493; gCoef(3,1) = 0.36268378337836198296;
00142     gCoef(4,0) = -gCoef(3,0)            ; gCoef(4,1) = gCoef(3,1);
00143     gCoef(5,0) = -gCoef(2,0)            ; gCoef(5,1) = gCoef(2,1);
00144     gCoef(6,0) = -gCoef(1,0)            ; gCoef(6,1) = gCoef(1,1);
00145     gCoef(7,0) = -gCoef(0,0)            ; gCoef(7,1) = gCoef(0,1);
00146   }
00147   else if(nGPoints == 12){
00148     gCoef( 0,0) = -0.981560634246719; gCoef( 0,1) = 0.047175336386511;
00149     gCoef( 1,0) = -0.904117256370475; gCoef( 1,1) = 0.106939325995318;
00150     gCoef( 2,0) = -0.769902674194305; gCoef( 2,1) = 0.160078328543346;
00151     gCoef( 3,0) = -0.587317954286617; gCoef( 3,1) = 0.203167426723066;
00152     gCoef( 4,0) = -0.367831498998180; gCoef( 4,1) = 0.233492536538355;
00153     gCoef( 5,0) = -0.125233408511469; gCoef( 5,1) = 0.249147045813403;
00154     gCoef( 6,0) = -gCoef(5,0)       ; gCoef( 6,1) = gCoef(5,1);
00155     gCoef( 7,0) = -gCoef(4,0)       ; gCoef( 7,1) = gCoef(4,1);
00156     gCoef( 8,0) = -gCoef(3,0)       ; gCoef( 8,1) = gCoef(3,1);
00157     gCoef( 9,0) = -gCoef(2,0)       ; gCoef( 9,1) = gCoef(2,1);
00158     gCoef(10,0) = -gCoef(1,0)       ; gCoef(10,1) = gCoef(1,1);
00159     gCoef(11,0) = -gCoef(0,0)       ; gCoef(11,1) = gCoef(0,1);
00160   }
00161   else if(nGPoints == 20){
00162     gCoef( 0,0) = -0.993128599185094924786; gCoef( 0,1) = 0.017614007139152118312;
00163     gCoef( 1,0) = -0.963971927277913791268; gCoef( 1,1) = 0.040601429800386941331;
00164     gCoef( 2,0) = -0.912234428251325905868; gCoef( 2,1) = 0.062672048334109063570;
00165     gCoef( 3,0) = -0.839116971822218823395; gCoef( 3,1) = 0.083276741576704748725;
00166     gCoef( 4,0) = -0.746331906460150792614; gCoef( 4,1) = 0.101930119817240435037;
00167     gCoef( 5,0) = -0.636053680726515025453; gCoef( 5,1) = 0.118194531961518417312;
00168     gCoef( 6,0) = -0.510867001950827098004; gCoef( 6,1) = 0.131688638449176626898;
00169     gCoef( 7,0) = -0.373706088715419560673; gCoef( 7,1) = 0.142096109318382051329;
00170     gCoef( 8,0) = -0.227785851141645078080; gCoef( 8,1) = 0.149172986472603746788;
00171     gCoef( 9,0) = -0.076526521133497333755; gCoef( 9,1) = 0.152753387130725850698;
00172     gCoef(10,0) = -gCoef(9,0)             ; gCoef(10,1) = gCoef(9,1);
00173     gCoef(11,0) = -gCoef(8,0)             ; gCoef(11,1) = gCoef(8,1);
00174     gCoef(12,0) = -gCoef(7,0)             ; gCoef(12,1) = gCoef(7,1);
00175     gCoef(13,0) = -gCoef(6,0)             ; gCoef(13,1) = gCoef(6,1);
00176     gCoef(14,0) = -gCoef(5,0)             ; gCoef(14,1) = gCoef(5,1);
00177     gCoef(15,0) = -gCoef(4,0)             ; gCoef(15,1) = gCoef(4,1);
00178     gCoef(16,0) = -gCoef(3,0)             ; gCoef(16,1) = gCoef(3,1);
00179     gCoef(17,0) = -gCoef(2,0)             ; gCoef(17,1) = gCoef(2,1);
00180     gCoef(18,0) = -gCoef(1,0)             ; gCoef(18,1) = gCoef(1,1);
00181     gCoef(19,0) = -gCoef(0,0)             ; gCoef(19,1) = gCoef(0,1);
00182   }
00183 
00184   for (unsigned int i=0; i<gCoef.rows(); ++i){
00185     for (unsigned int j=0; j<gCoef.rows(); ++j){
00186       gPoints.push_back( new GaussPoint( this->alpha,
00187                                          gCoef(i,1)*gCoef(j,1),
00188                                          jacobian,
00189                                          mat,
00190                                          i * nGPoints + j,
00191                                          points.readElement(0,0) + Ax/2 * ( 1 + gCoef(i,0) ) ,
00192                                          points.readElement(0,1) + Ay/2 * ( 1 + gCoef(j,0) ),
00193                                          0,
00194                                          dcx_in,
00195                                          dcy_in
00196                                        )
00197                        );
00198 
00199     }
00200   }
00201 }

00203 
00204 void CellRect::initialize( std::map<int,Node*> & nodes_in )
00205 {
00206 //   cout << "CellRect points " << this->points << endl;
00207 
00208   // This function can be joined with assembleGaussPoints so the Gpoints are iterated only once...
00209   for ( std::vector<GaussPoint*>::iterator it = gPoints.begin();
00210         it != gPoints.end();
00211         ++it)
00212   {
00213     (*it)->findSupportNodes( nodes_in, minX, maxX, minY, maxY );
00214   }
00215 }
00216 
00217 void CellRect::initialize( std::vector<Node*> & nodes_in )
00218 {
00219 //   cout << "CellRect points " << this->points << endl;
00220 
00221   // This function can be joined with assembleGaussPoints so the Gpoints are iterated only once...
00222   for ( std::vector<GaussPoint*>::iterator it = gPoints.begin();
00223         it != gPoints.end();
00224         ++it)
00225   {
00226     (*it)->findSupportNodes( nodes_in, minX, maxX, minY, maxY );
00227   }
00228 }
00229 
00230 void CellRect::gnuplotOut( std::ofstream& data, std::ofstream& gpdata )
00231 {
00232 //   cout << "Cell points" << points.rows() << ", " << points.cols() << endl;
00233 //   cout << "Cell points " << this->points << endl;
00234   
00235   for (unsigned int i=0; i<points.rows(); ++i){
00236     data << points(i,0) << " " << points(i,1) << " 0\n";
00237   }
00238   data << points(0,0) << " " << points(0,1) << " 0\n";
00239   data << std::endl;
00240 
00241   for(std::vector<GaussPoint*>::iterator it=gPoints.begin();
00242       it!=gPoints.end();
00243       ++it){
00244         (*it)->gnuplotOut( gpdata );
00245       }
00246 }
